resources.string: Select the paired bluetooth devices that will disable the pattern lock screen when connected
Select the configured wifi networks that will disable the pattern lock screen when connected
Any changed unlock device will take effect upon its next connection
No bluetooth devices have been paired
Disable keyguard when a selected bluetooth device is connected
Disable keyguard when a selected wifi network is connected

Keyguard management administrator. This controls the keyguard appearance based on wifi and bluetooth connections currently active. Unlock attempts are monitored to protect against incorrectly changing the PIN or password.
Keyguard unlocker has been disabled, password cleared
This device does not support bluetooth
No Wi-Fi networks have been configured
Warning: a different device administrator is enabled on this device and can prevent the keyguard unlocker from working
Necessary administrative permissions to set and remove the pin/password lock on the lock screen
You must verify your current PIN or password before continuing
Keyguard unlocker will not function unless device administrator is active
